newsitem.title: UK: Merrill still sifting KEPIT proposals.
newsitem.headline: Merrill still sifting KEPIT proposals.

text.p: Merrill Lynch is still in the process of examining various proposals to restructure the 500 million stg Kleinwort European Privatisation Investment Trust.
"We are working as fast as humanly possible," said a spokesman for Merrill, which is advising the independent board on choosing between 12 competing proposals.

There are 12 deals on the table, inlcuding one takever bid from TR European Growth Trust Plc, which yesterday received a boost from a 37 percent rise in net asset value per share in the 12 months tto end June.
The first closing for TR European's bid is 13 September and apart from saying that its helplines have been overwhelmed with calls, TR has refused to detail levels of acceptances.
